participant_1.background:
My dog loves spaghetti and meatballs as much as I do.
I like to wear clothing that is comfortable and modest, and that reflects my faith.
My favorite vacation was when my wife and I went to the Galapagos Islands.
I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
i am a lover of italian food.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes play the drums for hours on end, which is not very productive.
I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again.
I am a healthy person who enjoys cooking and keeping my hair natural.
my favorite singer is justin timberlike.
my father was an author.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well. I'm just getting ready to go ride my horses. What are you up to?
I'm just getting ready for a day of writing. I'm hoping to publish some of my comics soon.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to draw comics.
It's not too hard. You just need to have a good imagination and a lot of patience.
I'm sure I could do it. I love to draw and I'm pretty patient.
Well, if you ever want to give it a try, let me know. I'd be happy to help you learn.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
So, what's your favorite kind of music?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country.
Me too! I love listening to country music while I write.
It's the perfect music to relax to.
Exactly!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and spend time with my dog.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a Golden Retriever named Buddy.
I love Golden Retrievers! They're such friendly dogs.
They are! He's my best friend.
I'm sure he loves you too.
